feed.title: DALI @ MICCAI
feed.subtitle: The MICCAI workshop on Data Augmentatation, Labeling, and Imperfections.

entry.title: The Final Program Has Been Posted

link.title: The Final Program Has Been Posted

entry.content: We hope to see you on at the workshop on October 1st! The final program is now available on pathable.
entry.summary: We hope to see you on at the workshop on October 1st! The final program is now available on pathable.

entry.title: Paper Decisions Delayed
entry.content: We are waiting for a number of emergency reviews to come in and will therefore need until the end of the weekend to make final decisions on paper submissions to DALI 2021. We hope to have these ready by Monday, August 2nd. We appreciate your patience while we work to finish this process.
entry.summary: We are waiting for a number of emergency reviews to come in and will therefore need until the end of the weekend to make final decisions on paper submissions to DALI 2021. We hope to have these ready by Monday, August 2nd. We appreciate your patience while we work to finish this process.

entry.title: Deadline Extended
entry.content:
By popular demand, the paper submission deadline has been extended to July 2nd! Please submit your papers on our Microsoft CMT site.

For your convenience, here are answers to some common questions we have recieved:

  • Are submissions single or double blind?
    • Submissions are double blind. Please take measures to anonymize your submissions, just as you do for the main conference.
  • Are we allowed to post our submissions as preprints?
    • Yes! We encourage this.
  • Does the 8-page limit include references?
    • Yes. Please note that this is different from the 2021 main conference guidelines. You may, however, include content as supplementary material if it does not fit within this limit.
entry.summary: By popular demand, the paper submission deadline has been extended to July 2nd! Please submit your papers on our Microsoft CMT site.

entry.title: Paper Submission is Now Open
entry.content: You may now submit your paper to the DALI workshop on Microsoft CMT at https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/DALI2021! Submissions will be accepted until June 25, 2021 at 11:59 PDT.
entry.summary: You may now submit your paper to the DALI workshop on Microsoft CMT at https://cmt3.research.microsoft.com/DALI2021! Submissions will be accepted until June 25, 2021 at 11:59 PDT.

entry.title: Introducing: DALI
entry.content:
Welcome to the homepage for the first MICCAI “DALI” Workshop. This workshop is the result of the merger of three workshop proposals that were submitted to the 2021 MICCAI Conference

  • MIL3D – Medical Image Learning with Less Labels – (proposed 2nd edition)
  • LABELS – Large-scale Annotation of Biomedical Data and Expert Label Synthesis – (proposed 6th edition)
  • DAIMIA – Data Augmentation and Imputation in Medical Image Analysis – (proposed 1st edition)

The MICCAI Satellite Event chairs recognized the overlap in our proposals and asked us to join forces, and DALI is the result!
entry.summary: Welcome to the homepage for the first MICCAI “DALI” Workshop. This workshop is the result of the merger of three workshop proposals that were submitted to the 2021 MICCAI Conference
